titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 4931) to provide that the pension and individual retirement arrangement provisions of the Economic Growth and Tax Relief Reconciliation Act of 2001 shall be permanent.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-522, by Mr. Linder.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 177.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 451.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 344 - 52 (Roll no. 245).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 6/20/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 4931 (retirement savings security).
